entry.title: lencx/Noi
entry.summary:
ğŸ¦„ AI + Tools + Plugins + Community

AI + Tools + Plugins + Community

Feature

  • Support for loading any URL and system tray
  • Theme Mode (Light/Dark)
  • Multiple Languages
  • Prompt Management
  • AI Batch Questioning
  • ...

Install

  • macOS
    • â¬‡ï¸ x64
    • â¬‡ï¸ arm64
  • Windows
    • â¬‡ï¸ x64
  • Linux
    • â¬‡ï¸ AppImage
    • â¬‡ï¸ amd64.deb
Preview Preview

FAQ

macOS

If you encounter the error message "Noi" is damaged and can't be opened. You should move it to the Trash. while installing software on macOS, it may be due to security settings restrictions in macOS. To solve this problem, please try the following command in Terminal:

xattr -cr /Applications/Noi.app

TODO

  • Notes
  • Toolset
  • Plugin system

Ğ§Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ‹ Ğ¿Ñ€ĞµĞ²Ñ€Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ‚ÑŒ Ğ»ÑĞ±Ğ¾Ğ¹ ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ñ€Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ²Ñ‹Ğ¹ ÑĞºÑ€Ğ¸Ğ¿Ñ‚ Ğ² Ğ¼ÑƒĞ»ÑŒÑ‚Ğ¸, Ğ½Ğ°Ğ´Ğ¾ Ğ·Ğ°Ğ¼ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ñ‚ÑŒ send_universal Ğ½Ğ° send_multigpu --gpu 0 Ğ·Ğ°Ğ¼ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ñ‚ÑŒ Ğ½Ğ° --gpu-count X, Ğ³Ğ´Ğµ Ğ¥ ĞºĞ¾Ğ»-Ğ²Ğ¾ Ğ²Ğ°ÑˆĞ¸Ñ… GPU Ğ‘Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒÑˆĞµ Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ‡ĞµĞ³Ğ¾ Ğ¼ĞµĞ½ÑÑ‚ÑŒ Ğ½Ğµ Ğ½ÑƒĞ¶Ğ½Ğ¾, Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ¶Ğ½Ğ¾ Ğ·Ğ°Ğ¿ÑƒÑĞºĞ°Ñ‚ÑŒ

EN

Community - https://t.me/blckbazars

Miner for GRAM jetton. CUDA or OpenCL GPU needed.

  • Create config.txt
  • Enter your mnemonic config.txt in format
SEED=word1 word2
  • Activate v4r2 wallet linked to mnemonic and send some funds there
  • Install nodejs https://nodejs.org
  • Start miner by opening start_tonhub.bat (for AMD - start_tonhub_amd.bat)
